feed.title: ifo
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: btvdetail
entry.content:
Bitvote

BitVote(BTV) is a community consensus system, and it forms an self-evolving autonomous community organization and safe cryptocurrency system.

（1）One-CPU-One-Vote
The appearance of ASIC mining machine broke Satoshi Nakamoto’s assumption of one-CPU-one-vote, as a result, the decentralized operation system of BTC only exists in name. Under the PoW right proof system, the longest chain has the bookkeeping right; therefore magnates of mining pools control large hashrate, and interfere with community development. BitVote adopts CryptoNight algorithm to balance hashrate distribution, which decentralizes the voting right to users who take part in community development, so that users can participate in big decisions of BitVote community. Hard fork will be avoided and true decentralization will be realized.

（2）Block Vote System
About how to establish a more reasonable autonomous community and solve divergence more democratically, BitVote adopts the scheme of using block mark right independently to bid for voting. Community users can participate in bidding equally to acquire block mark right. The mark right will be used in vote signature. Participants can choose from “Support”, “Against” and “ absent”. Signed blocks are effective blocks, and the direction of community development is decided by voting result.

（3）DAO
BitVote is a decentralized and open autonomous organization. Users trust each other and the endorsement of a third party is not needed. It has bigger blocks and handling capacity to deal with transaction data, which can help solve the network congestion of Bitcoin easily. BitVote can be considered as the self-evolving Bitcoin, which has improved expandability and makes Bitcoin be greater.

Project name Bitvote(BTV)
Forking Height 505050
Forking Time 2018/1/21
Replay protection Supported
Mining algorithm CryptoNight(CPU)
Pre-Mining No Pre-mining
Fork coin quantity ratio BTC 1:1
Total amount 21 million
Official website www.bitvote.one
Official team BTV team
Other information Block vote

Under the PoW right proof system, the longest chain has the bookkeeping right; therefore magnates of mining pools control large hashrate, and interfere with community development. BitVote adopts CryptoNight algorithm to balance hashrate distribution, which decentralizes the voting right to users who take part in community development, so that users can participate in big decisions of BitVote community. Hard fork will be avoided and true decentralization will be realized. （2）Block Vote System About how to establish a more reasonable autonomous community and solve divergence more democratically, BitVote adopts the scheme of using block mark right independently to bid for voting. Community users can participate in bidding equally to acquire block mark right. The mark right will be used in vote signature. Participants can choose from “Support”, “Against” and “ absent”. Signed blocks are effective blocks, and the direction of community development is decided by voting result. （3）DAO BitVote is a decentralized and open autonomous organization. Users trust each other and the endorsement of a third party is not needed. It has bigger blocks and handling capacity to deal with transaction data, which can help solve the network congestion of Bitcoin easily. BitVote can be considered as the self-evolving Bitcoin, which has improved expandability and makes Bitcoin be greater. Project name Bitvote(BTV) Forking Height 505050 Forking Time 2018/1/21 Replay protection Supported Mining algorithm CryptoNight(CPU) Pre-Mining No Pre-mining Fork coin quantity ratio BTC 1:1 Total amount 21 million Official website www.bitvote.one Official team BTV team Other information Block vote

entry.title: btvdetail
entry.content:
比特票

比特票（BTV）是一套社区共识系统，形成自我进化的自治社区组织和安全的数字加密货币体系。

（1）一CPU一票
ASIC矿机的出现，打破了中本聪one-CPU-one-vote的原本设想，BTC去中心化运作体系名存实亡。PoW权利证明体系下，最长链拥有记账权，矿池巨头掌控庞大算力，独裁干预社区发展。Bitvote采用CryptoNight算法，均衡算力分布，使投票权分散给参与社区建设的用户，共同参与Bitvote社区的重大决定，防止硬分叉，真正的实现去中心化。

（2）区块标记投票系统
如何建立起一个更合理的自治社区，使得分歧能够更民主的解决。Bitvote使用块标记权单独竞价投票的方案，社区用户均可平等的参与竞拍，获取区块标记权。标记权用于投票签名，投票选项有“支持”，“反对”和“弃权”，签署署名的区块为有效区块，根据投票结果决定社区发展方向。

（3）去中心化的开放自治组织DAO
Bitvote是一个区中心化的开放自治组织，用户相互建立信任无需第三方机构背书。拥有更大区块和吞吐量处理交易数据，轻松解决比特币网络拥堵。比特票可以看做是自我进化版的比特币，有更强的可拓展性，使比特币更伟大。

项目名 Bitvote(BTV)比特票
分叉高度 505050
分叉时间 2018年1月21日
重放保护 支持
挖矿算法 CryptoNight(CPU)
是否预挖 无预挖
分叉币数量比例 1:1
总量 2100万
项目官网 www.bitvote.one
项目团队 BTV团队
其他信息 区块标记投票

entry.title: btnanodetail
entry.content:
Bitcoin Nano

The purpose of Bitcoin Nano is to give Bitcoin a wider range of applications, such as online games, live video, etc. BTN will implement the Smart contracts via the side-chain technology, compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM). Everybody will be able to issue tokens on the side-chains and make the exchange between coins/tokens and Bitcoin Nano. All of these things will enable users to convert the values between multiple-domain and multiple-application scenarios.

Project Name Bitcoin Nano（BTN）
Fork Height 501888
Fork Time 2017/12/31
Total Supply 21 Million
Distribution Ratio BTC 1:1000
Difficulty Adjustment Every block
Block Size 8M
Consensus mechanism POW(Equihash)
Replay Protection Support
Pre-mining Not published
Official Site https://www.btcnano.org
Team Chaw Manyu
entry.summary: Bitcoin Nano The purpose of Bitcoin Nano is to give Bitcoin a wider range of applications, such as online games, live video, etc. BTN will implement the Smart contracts via the side-chain technology, compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM). Everybody will be able to issue tokens on the side-chains and make the exchange between coins/tokens and Bitcoin Nano. All of these things will enable users to convert the values between multiple-domain and multiple-application scenarios. Project Name Bitcoin Nano（BTN） Fork Height 501888 Fork Time 2017/12/31 Total Supply 21 Million Distribution Ratio BTC 1:1000 Difficulty Adjustment Every block Block Size 8M Consensus mechanism POW(Equihash) Replay Protection Support Pre-mining Not published Official Site https://www.btcnano.org Team Chaw Manyu

entry.title: bcbdetail
entry.content:
Bitcoin Boy

BCB, the abbreviation of Bitcoin Boy, is a new chain of 501,888 forked at the height of the bitcoin block, developed by the BCB team. BCB is a new bitcoin fork virtual currency and it will carry out hard fork test in January 1st, 2018, so as to add new features to bitcoin and make bitcoin network more perfect.

Project Name Bitcoin Boy（BCB）
Fork Height 501888
Fork Time 2017/12/31
Total Supply 2.31 Billion
Distribution Ratio BTC 1:100
Block Size 8M
Consensus mechanism Not Published
Replay Protection Not Published
Pre-mining 210 Million
Official Site https://www.bitcoinboy.org
Team BCB Team
entry.summary: Bitcoin Boy BCB, the abbreviation of Bitcoin Boy, is a new chain of 501,888 forked at the height of the bitcoin block, developed by the BCB team. BCB is a new bitcoin fork virtual currency and it will carry out hard fork test in January 1st, 2018, so as to add new features to bitcoin and make bitcoin network more perfect. Project Name Bitcoin Boy（BCB） Fork Height 501888 Fork Time 2017/12/31 Total Supply 2.31 Billion Distribution Ratio BTC 1:100 Block Size 8M Consensus mechanism Not Published Replay Protection Not Published Pre-mining 210 Million Official Site https://www.bitcoinboy.org Team BCB Team

entry.title: btnanodetail
entry.content:
Bitcoin Nano

Bitcoin Nano的目的是为了让比特币拥有更为广泛的应用领域，如在线游戏、视频直播等。 BTN将通过侧链技术(sidechain)，实现智能合约(smart contract)，兼容以太虚拟机(EVM)。允许任意用户在侧链上发行代币(token)，并和Bitcoin Nano直接进行兑换，通过这种方式实现多领域、多应用场景间的价值转移。

项目名 Bitcoin Nano（BTN）
分叉高度 501888
分叉时间 2017年12月31日
总量 210亿
分叉币比例 1:1000
难度调整 每个区块
区块大小 8M
共识机制 POW(Equihash)
重放保护 支持
预挖 未公布
项目官网 https://www.btcnano.org
项目团队 Chaw Manyu等
entry.summary: Bitcoin Nano Bitcoin Nano的目的是为了让比特币拥有更为广泛的应用领域，如在线游戏、视频直播等。 BTN将通过侧链技术(sidechain)，实现智能合约(smart contract)，兼容以太虚拟机(EVM)。允许任意用户在侧链上发行代币(token)，并和Bitcoin Nano直接进行兑换，通过这种方式实现多领域、多应用场景间的价值转移。 项目名 Bitcoin Nano（BTN） 分叉高度 501888 分叉时间 2017年12月31日 总量 210亿 分叉币比例 1:1000 难度调整 每个区块 区块大小 8M 共识机制 POW(Equihash) 重放保护 支持 预挖 未公布 项目官网 https://www.btcnano.org 项目团队 Chaw Manyu等

entry.title: bcbdetail
entry.content:
比特币男孩

比特男孩BCB（Bitcoin Boy）在比特币区块高度501,888进行分叉，其目的是为了加入比特币的新特性，使比特币网络更加完善。

分叉成功后，之前留存有比特币的地址上将按1：100的比例获赠的BCB，剩下的以挖矿方式收敛性释出，记账节点由持币者选举产生。此外，持有BMB（矿世币）的用户，也将在未来按照一定比例得到BCB糖果。

项目名 Bitcoin Boy（BCB）比特币男孩
分叉高度 501888
分叉时间 2017年12月31日
总量 23.1亿
分叉币比例 1:100
区块大小 8M
共识机制 未公布
重放保护 未公布
预挖 2.1亿
项目官网 https://www.bitcoinboy.org
项目团队 BCB Team

entry.title: bppdetail
entry.content:
Bitcoin Payment Performance (BPP)

Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim.

BPP – Bitcoin Payment Performance - a high performance crypto payment system. Bitcoin Payment Performance is committed to create an ecosystem with cutting edge technologies on core payment system, digital asset, wallet.

Project name Bitcoin Payment Performance (BPP)
Block height 501888
Hard-fork time 2017/12/31
Replay protection Support
Mining algorithm POW
Total Supply 21 Billion
Ratio to BTC 1：1000
Pre-mining 420 Million
Official Website http://bppay.org (not launched)
Project Team BPP Team
entry.summary: Bitcoin Payment Performance (BPP) Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim. BPP – Bitcoin Payment Performance - a high performance crypto payment system. Bitcoin Payment Performance is committed to create an ecosystem with cutting edge technologies on core payment system, digital asset, wallet. Project name Bitcoin Payment Performance (BPP) Block height 501888 Hard-fork time 2017/12/31 Replay protection Support Mining algorithm POW Total Supply 21 Billion Ratio to BTC 1：1000 Pre-mining 420 Million Official Website http://bppay.org (not launched) Project Team BPP Team

entry.title: bcodetail
entry.content:
Bitcoin Ore

Bitcoin Ore will use a POC（Proof Of Capacity）consensus mechanism to ensure everyone can mine BCO with their hard disk capacity.

Project Name BCO (Bitcoin Ore)
Fork Height 501949
Fork Time 2017/12/31
Total Supply 21 Million
Distribution Ratio BTC 1:1
Consensus mechanism POC（Proof Of Capacity）
Replay Protection Yes
Pre-mining 1600 Block incentives
Official Site http://www.bitcoinore.org/
Team Tom Budd、Chunjiang Gu、Qijiang Xu
entry.summary: Bitcoin Ore Bitcoin Ore will use a POC（Proof Of Capacity）consensus mechanism to ensure everyone can mine BCO with their hard disk capacity. Project Name BCO (Bitcoin Ore) Fork Height 501949 Fork Time 2017/12/31 Total Supply 21 Million Distribution Ratio BTC 1:1 Consensus mechanism POC（Proof Of Capacity） Replay Protection Yes Pre-mining 1600 Block incentives Official Site http://www.bitcoinore.org/ Team Tom Budd、Chunjiang Gu、Qijiang Xu

entry.title: bppdetail
entry.content:
比特币高性能支付

BPP是来自于比特币主链的分叉区块链BPP致力于打造成为核心支付系统、数字资产、数字钱包等高尖端的技术生态，形成高效完美的加密支付生态系统。

项目名 比特币高性能支付 (BPP)
分叉高度 501888
分叉时间 2017年12月31号
重放保护 支持
共识机制 POW
总量 210亿
兑换比例 1：1000
预挖 4.2亿
项目官网 http://bppay.org (尚未上线)
项目团队 BPP团队
entry.summary: 比特币高性能支付 BPP是来自于比特币主链的分叉区块链BPP致力于打造成为核心支付系统、数字资产、数字钱包等高尖端的技术生态，形成高效完美的加密支付生态系统。 项目名 比特币高性能支付 (BPP) 分叉高度 501888 分叉时间 2017年12月31号 重放保护 支持 共识机制 POW 总量 210亿 兑换比例 1：1000 预挖 4.2亿 项目官网 http://bppay.org (尚未上线) 项目团队 BPP团队

entry.title: bcodetail
entry.content:
比特矿石

BCO是基于比特币网络的硬分叉。BCO将采用严谨证明的容量证明共识机制，通俗点就是用硬盘的容量存放哈希值，寻找正确的哈希值就是挖矿过程。

项目名 比特矿石 (Bitcoin Ore)
分叉高度 501949
分叉时间 2017年12月31日
总量 2100万
分叉币比例 1:1
共识机制 POC（Proof Of Capacity）容量证明
重放保护 支持
预挖 1600个区块收益
项目官网 http://www.bitcoinore.org/
项目团队 Tom Budd、顾春江、徐旗江
